translation: How To Use
When you choose a VRM file, loading and analysis start automatically. If needed, change where to save the PMX file, then click "Save PMX".
File Menu
VRM File
Choose the VRM file to convert.
Motion File
Choose the motion file (VMD/VPD) to apply.
Preview Materials
Toggle which materials are visible in the preview.
PMX Save Path
Path to save the PMX file. A suggested path is filled in automatically after loading a VRM.
Save as PMX
Save the currently loaded VRM as a PMX file.
Could Not Load
Could Not Save
Conversion Failed

id: VRMを読み込んでプレビューを表示してください
translation: Please load a VRM file and show the preview first.

id: VRMファイルを指定してください
translation: Please choose a VRM file.

id: PMX出力パスを指定してください
translation: Please choose where to save the PMX file.
